data.lyric:
[ti:Wrap Me In Plastic]
[ar:CHROMANCE]
[al:Wrap Me In Plastic]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Wrap Me In Plastic - CHROMANCE
[00:00.23]Lyrics by：Daniel France Stanfill/Johannes-Chane Becker/Marcus Layton
[00:00.47]Composed by：Daniel France Stanfill/Johannes-Chane Becker/Marcus Layton
[00:00.71]It's my first night out with you
[00:04.19]
[00:05.85]Treat me right and buy me shoes
[00:09.50]
[00:11.12]Let me be your fantasy
[00:15.18]Play with me I wanna be your girl
[00:19.54]
[00:22.18]Just give me some time I'll be ready
[00:24.77]Do my make-up bathe in my perfume
[00:27.48]Quick shower won't take too long
[00:29.51]
[00:30.25]I'll be done just sing this song
[00:32.31]So wrap me in plastic and make me shine
[00:35.13]We can make a dollhouse follow your design
[00:37.81]Let's build a dog out of sticks and twine
[00:40.44]I can call you master you can call me mine

data.trans:
[ti:让我好好打扮]
[ar:CHROMANCE]
[al:让我好好打扮]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.47]//
[00:00.71]这是我第一次和你在晚上约会
[00:04.19]
[00:05.85]对我好点 给我买鞋子
[00:09.50]
[00:11.12]让我做你的梦中情人
[00:15.18]和我在一起吧 我想做你的女友
[00:19.54]
[00:22.18]给我一点时间 我很快就准备好
[00:24.77]我要化妆 喷香水
[00:27.48]冲个澡 要不了多久的
[00:29.51]
[00:30.25]唱完这首歌我就可以了
[00:32.31]让我好好打扮 让我光芒四射
[00:35.13]我们可以做个玩具小屋 让你来设计
[00:37.81]让我们先制作一只小狗 用木棍和绳子制作
[00:40.44]我可以叫你主人 你可以拥有我
[00:43.14]让我好好打扮 让我光芒四射
[00:45.79]我们可以做个玩具小屋 让你来设计
[00:48.48]让我们先制作一只小狗 用木棍和绳子制作
[00:51.12]我可以叫你主人 你可以拥有我
